# Boost C++ 库

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/boost-c-ku
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/boost-c-ku
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install boost-c-ku
boost-c-ku <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g boost-c-ku
boost-c-ku <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
